value.fullName: 0 - No new technology being implemented or is standard process
value.label: 0 - No new technology being implemented or is standard process

value.fullName: 1 - Existing HRC technology, but nonstandard process (configured, not customized)
value.label: 1 - Existing HRC technology, but nonstandard process (configured, not customized)

value.fullName: 2 - Existing HRC technology but requires integration, new toolset, or local customization
value.label: 2 - Existing HRC technology but requires integration, new toolset, or local customization

value.fullName: 3 - Existing HRC technology but a new module, or mature technology that is new to HRC
value.label: 3 - Existing HRC technology but a new module, or mature technology that is new to HRC

value.fullName: 4 - Cutting edge technology that is new to HRC
value.label: 4 - Cutting edge technology that is new to HRC
